segments.text: How did you know that I love red roses ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's a secret . Here , let me help you with your coat , and we'll be on our way .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: ( at the dance ) That band is playing good music . Shall we dance ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Fine , what do you call this ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Foxtrot . Oh . you're a good dancer .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Really ? Thank you . I am thinking the same thing about you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I prefer the old style of dance because I enjoy holding a pretty girl like you closely .
segments.speaker: S2
